fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, International co-operation and development, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Youth, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Banking and financial services
eu_initiatives:
- OEM represents the employers in the International Labour Organization based in Geneva and attend the annual World Conference. OEM is actively involved in various project activities with ILO intending to enhance the social bi-partite dialogue in the country. 
- OEM is a member of the Advisory Committee for Vocational Training 
 
Main EU initiatives, policies and legislative followed files: 
- New Skills Agenda for Europe (Upskilling Pathways: New Opportunities for Adults, European Qualifications Framework, Vocational education and training (VET) 
- Rights at work  
- Health and safety at work 
- Labour law 
- Social dialogue 
- Employment and Labur market
organisation_name: Organization of Employers of Macedonia (ORM Skopje)
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
goals__remit: The basic goals and tasks of the organization is to represent the interests of the employers in general and especially in the social partnership and dialogue, to take care of the development and the realization of the rights and freedoms of the employers, collective bargaining, concluding and implementing the General Collective Agreement for the private sector of the country and the collective agreements at the branch level. Promoting the rights and the interests of the employers through coordination and cooperation with the social partners.
